data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wieczorek, Karina, Qiao, Ge-Xia, Sano, Masakazu, Yoshitomi, Hiroyuki, Kanturski, Mariusz (2016): Descriptions of little-known and unknown morphs of Periphyllus acerihabitans Zhang (Hemiptera: Aphididae: Chaitophorinae). Zootaxa 4092 (4): 583-592, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4092.4.8
